name: 64 Mercury
description:
The region has come under siege by creatures known as Mercury. Your mission: Eliminate the threat!

64 Mercury is a tiny take on Project Mercury. In this small demo, you'll fight the Mercury menace on foot, on a hoverbike, and down a bottomless pit. Good luck!

Default Controls:

Arrow Keys - Move
Z - Jump
X - Aim
C - Shoot
Enter - Go
Escape - Pause/Back
Alt+Enter - Full Screen

Gamepad settings can be found in the options menu.
